title: Nashville and Other Luxury Real Estate Hotspots
description: Nashville topped the second-quarter Emerging Housing Market Index from The Wall Street Journal and Realtor.com because of its warm weather, strong economy and lack of state income taxes. Join Realtor.com senior economist George Ratiu, CEO and owner of Zeitlin Sotheby’s International Realty in Nashville, Jessica Averbuch, and Mansion Global reporter Leslie Hendrickson for a discussion.
